text: THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR YOUR HELP TODAY.
I REALLY APPRECIATE YOU TAKING THE TIME TO ASSIST ME.
WOULD YOU MIND HELPING ME WITH THIS WHEN YOU HAVE A MOMENT?
I HOPE YOU HAVE A WONDERFUL DAY.
IT WAS SO KIND OF YOU TO THINK OF ME.
PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF THERE IS ANYTHING I CAN DO FOR YOU.
I AM GRATEFUL FOR YOUR PATIENCE AND UNDERSTANDING.
THANK YOU FOR YOUR THOUGHTFUL RESPONSE.
I WOULD BE HAPPY TO HELP YOU WITH THAT.
IT IS A PLEASURE TO MEET YOU.
